Package org.cesecore.config

Interface ExternalScriptsConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GlobalConfiguration
    public interface ExternalScriptsConfiguration
    Type for configurable calls to external scripts.
    Version:
    $Id: ExternalScriptsConfiguration.java 27691 2017-12-29 14:24:12Z bastianf $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean getEnableExternalScripts()
      Gets if external scripts on the local are allowed to be called.
      String getExternalScriptsWhitelist()
      Get a string containing a whitelist of external scripts permitted to be executed by "External Command Validators"
      boolean getIsExternalScriptsWhitelistEnabled()
      Gets a value indicating whether a whitelist for external commands should be used.
      void setEnableExternalScripts​(boolean value)
      Sets if external scripts on the local are allowed to be called.
      void setExternalScriptsWhitelist​(String value)
      Sets an external scripts whitelist.
      void setIsExternalScriptsWhitelistEnabled​(boolean value)
      Sets a value indicating whether a whitelist for external commands should be used.

    • Method Detail

      • setEnableExternalScripts

        void setEnableExternalScripts​(boolean value)
        Sets if external scripts on the local are allowed to be called.
        Parameters:
        value - the value.

      • getEnableExternalScripts

        boolean getEnableExternalScripts()
        Gets if external scripts on the local are allowed to be called.
        Returns:
        the value.

      • getExternalScriptsWhitelist

        String getExternalScriptsWhitelist()
        Get a string containing a whitelist of external scripts permitted to be executed by "External Command Validators"
        Returns:
        the contents of the External Scripts whitelist

      • setExternalScriptsWhitelist

        void setExternalScriptsWhitelist​(String value)
        Sets an external scripts whitelist.
        Parameters:
        value - a multi-line string containing the contents of the whitelist
        See Also:
        getExternalScriptsWhitelist()

      • getIsExternalScriptsWhitelistEnabled

        boolean getIsExternalScriptsWhitelistEnabled()
        Gets a value indicating whether a whitelist for external commands should be used.
        Returns:
        true if the the whitelist retrieved from getExternalScriptsWhitelist() should be used

      • setIsExternalScriptsWhitelistEnabled

        void setIsExternalScriptsWhitelistEnabled​(boolean value)
        Sets a value indicating whether a whitelist for external commands should be used.
        Parameters:
        value - true if a whitelist should be used, false otherwise
        See Also:
        getEnableExternalScripts()
